CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Primary_Phone_Contact__c) = "Work", Phone, (IF( TEXT(Primary_Phone_Contact__c) = "Mobile", PersonMobilePhone, (IF( TEXT(Primary_Phone_Contact__c) = "Home", PersonHomePhone, (IF( TEXT(Primary_Phone_Contact__c) = "Other", PersonOtherPhone, '')))))))
CustomField.label: Primary Contact Number
